feature_model.name: BerkeleyDBMemory version Product Line

meta.data: Roberto Lopez-Herrejon based on N. Siegmund dissertation

feature_model.feature_tree: :r BerkeleyDB (BerkeleyDB) :o HAVE_CRYPTO (HAVE_CRYPTO) :o HAVE_HASH (HAVE_HASH) :o PAGESIZE (PAGESIZE) :g [1,1] : PS1K (PS1K) : PS4K (PS4K) : PS8K (PS8K) : PS16K (PS16K) : PS32K (PS32K) :o HAVE_REPLICATION (HAVE_REPLICATION) :o HAVE_VERIFY (HAVE_VERIFY) :o HAVE_SEQUENCE (HAVE_SEQUENCE) :o CACHESIZE (CACHESIZE) :g [1,1] : CS16MB (CS16MB) : CS32MB (CS32MB) : CS64MB (CS64MB) : CS512MB (CS512MB) :o DIAGNOSTIC (DIAGNOSTIC) :o HAVE_STATISTICS (HAVE_STATISTICS)
